contentBlocks.title: General Pool Lighting Timer Requirements
paragraphs: Pool lighting timers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Pool lighting timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool lighting timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool lighting timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Pool lighting timers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Pool lighting timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool lighting timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool lighting timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Pool lighting timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Pool lighting timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Pool lighting timers must be suitable for the intended use of the pool.
Pool lighting timers must be installed by a qualified person.
